events.title: RTV CRON 0x2
events.description: Creating evasive payloads in the modern EDR landscape is less about knowing what to do, and more about learning what not to do. Although EDR has moved away from relying on static binary signatures, rule-based detections are still in play. Every step of payload execution is an opportunity to be detected. In this workshop, we showcase step-by-step instructions on how to craft evasive payloads. Attendees will have a better understanding of how to craft complex payloads and learn about how payloads are executed, from process creation to initial callback.

events.title: RTV @ HackSpaceCon
events.description: RTV will be at HackSpaceCon 2025. We'll have a booth and we'll be discussing the latest news in the village. We'll also be hosting a CTF competition.

events.title: Red Team Village @ DEF CON 33
events.location: Las Vegas Convention Center, Red Team Village Area
events.description: Visit the village at DEF CON 33! We'll have a weekend packed with workshops, activities, swag, and so much more!
